item.name: config
item.item: For advanced configuration you can use Payment Restrictions extension.

item.name: tooltipOne
item.item: Calculated as {used_store_credit} minus {repayment_amount}, where: {used_store_credit} is the sum of orders paid with store credit less refunded amounts, {repayment_amount} is the sum of real money actually paid by Company to cover store credit usage.

item.name: tooltipTwo
item.item: The negative store credit balance has to be repaid until the stated date, otherwise the penalty will be applied every day to the whole overdraft amount.

item.name: tooltipThree
item.item: The penalty will be applied everyday on the overdraft amount until the Current Balance is positive or 0.

item.name: tooltip
item.item: If enabled, company is allowed to have negative current balance up to set limit. It is also possible to charge penalty if negative balance remains unredeemed for more than specified period of time.
